scripts.db-backup: docker exec -i nakama-postgres-1 /bin/bash -c "PGPASSWORD=localdb pg_dump --username postgres -Fc nakama" > ./src/data-backup/data.dump
scripts.db-load-backup: docker exec -i nakama-postgres-1 /bin/bash -c "PGPASSWORD=localdb pg_restore --verbose --clean --no-acl --no-owner -h localhost -U postgres -d nakama" < ./src/data-backup/data.dump
